author: {'steamid': '76561198056996066', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 16, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1476801869}
review:
ハイエースみたいなバンの中でメタリックなオッサンに叩き起こされるところから始まる近未来FPS

少ししかやってませんが少しやっただけで大体どういうもんかわかります
そういうことです。察して下さい。
早期アクセスですし今後に期待。

ゲームスタートしていきなり周りを機械化ゾンビに囲まれ絶体絶命！
車内には限られた銃器と申し訳程度のナイフのみ…
この状況、かなりベタだが中々ワクワクする

そんな風に思っていた時期が自分にもありました(5分ぐらい

イベント中でメタリックなオッサンが喋ってるのに
普通に車の窓が割れて敵が入ってくる(もちろん攻撃してくる
メタリックなオッサンが喋ってる最中に自分で窓が割れる(もちろん敵が入ってくる
そんなことお構いなしに喋って芝居を続けるオッサンを横目にゲームオーバーになること数回

それを乗り越えて梯子上りをさせられるわけですが
腕の上下運動と主人公の荒い息遣いを聞いてたら面倒くさくなってやめました。おしまい。

ちなみに死ぬと一番最初からだ！面倒くせぇ！

色々とやりたい事があるのは見て取れて面白みが滲み出ているが
現状、笑って許せるクソゲー状態なのでもう少しちゃんとやれば楽しいだろうし
もう少し内容が濃くなればきっと良いものだと思います
グラフィックも良いですし拘りは感じます。今後に期待できるゲーム。
期待だけしてフェードアウトしないことを願いますが。

author: {'steamid': '76561197998657707', 'num_games_owned': 354, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1475567957}
review:
The game has potential but alot needs to be worked on , for example when the game started I had ZERO clue what was going on aside from the fact that there were cyborg zombies outside the van I was in , None of the voicing was in english and there were only some subtitles to explain stuff , picking up my rifle was instantly glitchy for me as it spawned halfway into the table.

If they can make a way better tutorial and possible explain what exactly is going on , I might be able to reccommend this but for now , Nope/

Save your money.

author: {'steamid': '76561198084373744', 'num_games_owned': 1313, 'num_reviews': 262, 'playtime_forever': 22, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1475654708}
review:
如果你对这个游戏感兴趣，不妨先看看我的视频(video):
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMTc0OTIxNTI0NA==.html

我不是很懂，为什么一个DEMO要收费，而且做的如此粗糙
大家看看我视频就可以了，本来想给差评的，毕竟是抢先体验游戏，而且还有中文，昧着良心给个好评
画面有些掉帧，射击感觉一般。模型做的还行，但是僵尸的动作太傻了

身为一位人类部队最后幸存者之一，整个世界已经几乎崩溃，你需要和其他存活的人们一起，拿起手中的武器，作最后的抵抗，你将会数次身处被敌人包围的处境，只有不断地射击才有机会存活。这是宗旨，希望以后改改好

每天都会录制VR游戏视频，喜欢的话可以订阅哦
steam毕竟是一个要花钱的平台，所以我希望用我的视频让大家能更好的了解每一个游戏
最后，祝大家游戏越快哦~

author: {'steamid': '76561198331461334', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 10, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1475698811}
review:
In my view this game has good potential. Yes, it's very short as it's a very short demo/preview, however, what I've experienced in this brief time leads me to believe this could be fantastic if the developers stick at it and the community here supports it. 
I love the intro video - gives you the cinematic feeling of what's to come and in doing so the games feels better for it. I think the graphics are fine and no doubt will get better. The metal clad fellow side kick in the back of the van has fantastic animation - the best I've seen in all VR games as of yet. Yes the zombies look all the same but that will no doubt change - and I love the way they move so fast. Mandarin speech with English text translations but this will be updated at some point I'd imagine. 

Please developers don't be put off by negative comments about the early standard of the game itself and stick at it - you're on to something good here; it has potential!  These are the sort of games that the HTC Vive and Steam VR needs. Good start, stick at it - as the game is a preview think about about releasing a free demo to encourage a loyal following! I'm looking forward to the next updates!

Danial

author: {'steamid': '76561198260599146', 'num_games_owned': 2714, 'num_reviews': 265, 'playtime_forever': 25, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1484434987}

author: {'steamid': '76561198012915042', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 169, 'playtime_forever': 26, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1476586772}
review:
Game has great potential. 

CONS: It has wayyy tooo many bugs at the moment.
           Enemies judder bounce around at times and even merge into you. 
           Add better animations and more fluent ones. Hit reaction and detection needs to be fixed

PROS: Grpahics are good. 
           Old school arcade feeling
           Great cinematic story immersion like old sega CD games
           I want to beat the whole game

review: 给个差评，里面杀僵尸只能打头，打身体完全没反应，僵尸还能跟自己的身体重叠、，我也是醉了，、游戏玩起来一下就死了，死了重新开始又看来一遍影片才能开始，表示无语、就这一点很让人反感，僵尸扑过开，然后跟自己合体了，真想问问开发怎么打？开枪打自己？而且僵尸只能打头。，。。只能打头。。。去尼玛吧

author: {'steamid': '76561198058602281', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 179, 'playtime_forever': 16, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1475372878}
review:
I've played for maybe 10 minutes. 

Looks very good. 
Plays well. 
Sounds good. 

The enemies are too aggressive during the tutorial stage.  Dude is trying to tell me what to do and I cant concentrate on what he is saying because the enemies are climbing in and I have to keep killing them.  Its also hard to kill them when the other NPC is standing in the way, so I cant see them all that well. 

So currently I cannot survive long enough to hit the red bar.  I will keep trying.   I like this game so far.

The trailer that you can't skip is annoying though.

author: {'steamid': '76561197983689849', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 183, 'playtime_forever': 25, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1475281048}
review:
https://youtu.be/q2hyApJB2FU

I received a key for the demo release of TEOT, The End of Tomorrow from this thread in the community discussion: http://steamcommunity.com/app/529280

This appears to be a story driven wave shooter but potentially more story/mission based?? It's very hard to tell from this short demo. There is a movie like intro and story trailer but the gameplay that we have is a very small 'wave defense' style area and then climbing a ladder. Hard to tell much from that.

The story seems interesting but it's killed by the localization and the weapon sounds. What I can hear, sounds awkward and the rest is drowned out by the other game sounds. This definitely needs some sound rebalancing. 

Graphically it wasn't too bad though they made some poor decisions with locking your head in place and moving your head for you.

Ultimately I can't say this is worth the download. It's a short and somewhat painful experience. Even if it were free, I don't think I'd give the go ahead on this one. That being said, I'd love to see what they can do to it in a few more months of development.

VR Graphics 6.5/10 (I could play it and not bleed from the eyes but there's a good bit of room for improvement.)
VR Audio 3/10 (Localization issues, awkward VOs and mostly volume balance was not done. Not even attempted...)
VR Gameplay ??/10 (It's hard to say from that short of a demo. Maybe a 6 or a 7 for lack of polish. Less if it ends up being JUST another wave shooter and isn't mind blowing or at least trying something new.)

Locomotion N/A
Looked like we could teleport but not in this demo. We're locked into one spot for the whole thing.


At the end of the day, this does seem interesting and again, I'd love to see it in a few months when it's cleaned up. Right now though, I can't say it would be an acceptable experience if it were free. I know the devs need to eat but they also need to put out a product worth supporting. Right now this isn't it. I think it -could- be in time. The market is prime for some good story driven action. Sadly this one falls short. I do hope they stick with it though and I can flip this review around.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029982617', 'num_games_owned': 526, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1475268868}
review:
The steam page is full of grammatical errors and confusing game trailers. But the game is only 1.99$ so why not try it out? Well, have you ever wanted to be in a game commercial? Now you can. This game starts off with a trailer, and also ends with a trailer whether you win or lose. In the middle you have a short game where you fight off zombies from a truck until you’re able to escape. 

[b]The game trailers are over the top and intrusive, and it looks like a lot of time and effort has been put into it. The actual gameplay on the other hand is nothing like the trailers.[/b] 

As the first trailer ends the game starts with a cutscene and the game warns you not to move. This is because your head tracking is somewhat disabled at this point, and moving and looking around simply makes you sick because of it. [b]I think every VR developer should experience this part just to see why you shouldn’t do a “typical” cutscene in a vr game.[/b] 

The graphics are decent by VR standards, but currently there’s only one zombie model and it feel like someone pressed Ctrl+C and made a couple of Ctrl+V and voilà: a zombie horde! You have a great amount of weapons to choose from but none of them feels satisfying. You have to hold down the grip button at all time or you’ll drop the weapons. Weapon aim is done with giant laser sight. And the sound in general is not good. Several times the enemies got stuck in my character and I had to “shoot myself” to kill them. I could go on but let’s just say it feels very unpolished and cheap, even by EA standards. 

My interpolations of the game’s description tells me that this is actually a demo of a game that’s coming sometime in the future. First of all you should not charge anyone for a demo, especially if the demo is spammed with trailers/commercials. Also a demo should encourage the gamer to desire more gameplay and story, rather than more alpha testing..
